c74object.name: abc.hoa.decoder~
c74object.description:
abc.hoa.decoder~ is a 2D Ambisonic (HOA) decoder.
This object enable to decode from ambisonic spatial components to sets of loudspeakers. At order 1, by default 4 loudspeakers, at order 2, 6 LS, at order 3, 8 LS, ... at order 7,16 LS. To change the number of loudspeakers, objects have been added to enable any number of loudspeakers betwen 3 (above stereo) and 16 at any order. This decoder use Ambisonics Channel Numbering and N2D format.

method.name: a[index]
method.description: set the angle of the speaker [index], [index] is a 2 digits integer, if value inferior to 10 index should be written "06" for example.
method.digest: set the angle of the speaker [index]

method.name: angularoffset
method.description: set an offset to the angle of all the speakers [min=-180, max=180, step=1].
method.digest: set an offset to the angle of all the speakers

method.name: directangles
method.description: set rotation direction, true is anti-clockwise, false is clockwise [init=1:min=0:max=1:step=1].

method.name: stereo
method.description: set decoder mode to be stereo or ambisonic, true is stereo decode, false is ambisonic decode [init=0:min=0:max=1:step=1].
method.digest: set decoder mode to be stereo or ambisonic

method.name: gain
method.description: set decoder gain in dB [init=0, min=-127, max=18, step=0.01].
